mdefinition: Constituent forms finer-grained material interstitial to a framework constituent. The finer-grained material enclosing,or filling the interstices between,the larger grains or particles of a sediment or sedimentary rock....The term refers to the relative size and disposition of the particles,and no particular particle size is implied (Jackson,1997,p. 393). May be classifiable into orthomatrix, protomatrix.
